Richard Comely has worked as a designer, illustrator, and writer since 1968.
He published his first eidition of Captain Canuck in 1975. He contines to write,
illustrate and storyboard for comic books, magazines and television.

Richard and Evelyn Comely are putting their years of experience to good use with
the launch of Tri-City Super Con.

Got a project you would like their help with?
Contact Richard and Evelyn at:
comelys@live.com
519.913.1923 cell 519.740.7837
